title: Sound On: Mayor Bowser, Rep. Luetkemeyer on Infrastructure, Small Business (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Mayor Bowser, Rep. Luetkemeyer on Infrastructure, Small Business (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests:

Washington D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser

Rep. Blaine Luetkemeyer (R-MO)

Bloomberg Intelligence Analyst Jennifer Rie

Dan Harris, founder of Harris Bricken

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
